name: One direction (Myline.media)
description:
The game was developed in three days for Score Space Jam #10.

my instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myline.media/

                                                                         Rules:

1. Press any button to move.
2. Move in rhythm (move when the square intersects with the stick).
3. Don't step on the red pieces. (it's better not to risk it :)
4. Collect as many points as possible or at least more than me (50).
5. Enemies also move in rhythm (learn their behavior model).
